title.rendered: Evening Medical Assistant | Broken Arrow, OK

content.rendered:
Evening Medical Assistant | Broken Arrow, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time, Monday-Friday noon-8pm
  • Must have 2+ years MA experience in FP, IM or Pediatrics
  • Prefer CMA or RMA
  • Must have Electronic Medical Record Experience
  • Must have experience setting up and assisting with procedure
  • Responsible for vitals, phlebotomy and injections
  • $12/hour Depending on Experience
